page.title: 04CROPS AND LANDCOVER
page.content: {Cereals}predominate in a ratio of 2/3 wheat to 1/3 barley.Varieties vary, producing high quality grain for bread & malt,lower quality for animal feed.{ {Grassland}is the 2nd largest acreage providing grazing & winter keep for the livestock.Some is permanent pasture,the remainder shorter term leys.The 3rd largest area is arable break crops:oilseed rape,peas & beans. Rape is crushed for vegetable oil,peas & beans are high protein animal feed. There are small areas of forage maize for silage & mustard.A small area is permanent deciduous{Woodland.}Fields are bounded by hedges &/or ditches, approximately 15_20 acres in total area.Fields are accessable by rough hard_core tracks.The concrete runways of a disused wartime airfield cut across some of the land.
